notifications.no-value: Cannot create a trade good without a value

gather-info-accuracy.name: Gather rumors accuracy
gather-info-accuracy.hint: The base value for whether gather rumors is accurate. Default: 70

gather-info-diplo.name: Gather rumors diplomacy DC
gather-info-diplo.hint: The DC by which gather rumors accuracy increases or decreases. Default: 20

gather-info-chat.name: Post gather rumors results
gather-info-chat.hint: Whether to post gather rumors results to the chat. Default: yes

buy-sell-diplo.name: Buy/Sell diplomacy DC
buy-sell-diplo.hint: The DC by which a buy or sell price increases or decreases. Default 25

trade-menu.title: Swords & Sandals trading menu
trade-menu.no-good-selected: Select a good from the left to get started

overview.missing-goods: No trade goods configured for this city. Configure them in the module's settings first.

notifications.trade-good-missing-value: Trade good missing value. This can be configured in the module's settings.
notifications.trade-good-missing-demand: Trade good missing demand. This can be configured in the module's settings.
notifications.trade-good-missing-scarcity: Trade good missing supply. This can be configured in the module's settings.

delete-confirm-good.title: Delete trade good
delete-confirm-good.content: Are you sure you want to delete the trade good? This cannot be undone.

delete-confirm-city.title: Delete city
delete-confirm-city.content: Are you sure you want to delete the city? This cannot be undone.
